oracle.adf.view.faces.bi.component.thematicMap.mapProvider
Class LayerArea

java.lang.Object
  oracle.adf.view.faces.bi.component.thematicMap.mapProvider.LayerArea

public abstract class LayerArea
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract class for storing the information needed to draw an area for an area layer.

Constructor Summary
LayerArea()
           
 
Method Summary
abstract  java.lang.String getId()
          Returns the Id for this area which will be used to match data to this area.
abstract  java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getLabelBox()
          Returns the Rectangle bounding box for this area's label or null if the area's bounding box should be used.
abstract  java.lang.String getLongLabel()
          Returns the long label for this area or null if none exists.
abstract  java.lang.String getParent()
          Returns the Id of this area's parent within this basemap's layer hierarchy or null if no parent exists.
abstract  java.lang.String getPath()
          Returns the String representing the SVG path for this area.
abstract  java.lang.String getShortLabel()
          Returns the short abbreviated label for this area or null if none exists.

Returns the Id for this area which will be used to match data to this area.

getLabelBox

public abstract java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getLabelBox()
Returns the Rectangle bounding box for this area's label or null if the area's bounding box should be used.

the Rectangle bounding box for this area's label or null.

getPath

public abstract java.lang.String getPath()
Returns the String representing the SVG path for this area. It is recommended that relative commands be used and h/v commands used instead of l commands when possible.

Returns:
the String representing the SVG path commands for this area.

getParent

public abstract java.lang.String getParent()
Returns the Id of this area's parent within this basemap's layer hierarchy or null if no parent exists.

Returns:
the String Id of this area's parent or null.
